summary: Just a small Retex for this amazing bow...
descriptionHtml:
The Vanilla Version of this Bow was too simple, so I put some accents to it.
I also doubled the textures size and sharpened it a little bit, so now it looks more \"real\" in my opinion.

Installation:
Open the .zip-folder and copy the files to your ..\\Steam\\StamApps\\common\\skyrim\\textures\\weapons\\nightingale
(If it doesn\'t exist - create it!)
author: Benden1985
